title: Characteristics of the northern spotted owl

content.description: Correct statements about the northern spotted owl include which of the following?
content.question: It is a pioneer species that is an opportunistic feeder. It is dependent on mature, old-growth forest for its habitat. It is a carnivore at or near the top of the food chain.

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain environmental concepts, processes, or models in applied contexts.
